title: Adding an attribute as a buffer should throw in error
body_html:
We had a bug in OpenNMT where we first created an attribute self.mask and then tried to add mask as a buffer. This behavior will cause self.mask to exist, but not be cast with .cuda. We think this behavior is counter-intuitive, and it should throw an error.

@JianyuZhan
